TALK SOON SPEECH THERAPY

Speech Language Pathology Services in Southern Costa Rica

Meet Your Speech Therapist

Communication Concerns We Address

Late Talker

When should my child say their first words? How many words should my toddler have?

Difficult to Understand

My child makes a lot of errors when speaking; does he need speech therapy?

Grammar and Vocabulary

My child's always using the wrong verbs and pronouns; is that age-appropriate?

Autism

My child has delayed speech, difficulty making friends, and a hard time reading facial expressions. Can an SLP help?

Stuttering

My child repeats the first part of words over and over again. Does she need to see an SLP?
